title: Suit up your iPhone 13 with rugged protection from Rokform, maybe even for free in this giveaway
author: sponsored
summary: The power of magnets, the protection of Rokform
article: The iPhone 13 is here, and you’re going to want to protect your shiny new tech. Rokform’s cases provide a degree of protection much higher than a lot of the competition. And, to celebrate the launch of the new iPhone 13 and its new cases, Rokform is hosting a giveaway for nearly $300 worth of Rokform accessories to kit out their iPhone 13.
The latest cases from Rokform are part of its Crystal series and Rugged series. Whichever you choose, you can count on considerable protection for your device.

The Rokform Crystal case provides a degree of transparency, so the colors of your brand-new iPhone 13 can show through. It has clear paneling on the back, but that’s still made from hard plastic to protect the phone.
The Rokform Rugged case is built with a carbon fiber-style backing that’s scratch-resistant, so it can keep looking sharp even if you’re less than careful with your phone now and then.

Both the Rugged and Crystal series of cases provide notable protection for every corner of your device. They have reinforced edges and corners to absorb shock and keep the screen from hitting the ground should you drop your phone. That extra protection extends to the iPhone 13’s cameras too with a 2.6mm raised TPU ring to keep them out of harm’s way.

These new cases continue to offer Rokform’s signature feature with magnets, but they are also now MagSafe compatible. So, you’ll be able to use MagSafe wireless charging systems and accessories while keeping your phone secure in the Rokform case.

The magnets Rokform has built into the case provide some extra tricks. You can mount your phone to magnetic surfaces for convenient hands-free use. Throw it onto the fridge to keep a recipe handy while you’re cooking or mount it onto a toolbox while you’re at your workbench.

If the phone is ever on a non-magnetic surface, the anti-slip grip on the back of the case can still help keep it in place. You can also use the case’s rear attachment point to connect them with Rokform’s Twist Lock accessories for cars, bikes, motorcycles, and more, which go on with a simple twist and hold firmly in place with magnets.

If you’re excited about the new iPhone 13 series and want to keep the phone safe, be sure to check out Rokform’s Crystal and Rugged cases for the whole iPhone 13 lineup, from the iPhone 13 Mini all the way up to the iPhone 13 Pro Max. And, if you want a chance to win some Rokform swag for your iPhone 13, enter the Rokform giveaway below. You’ll have a chance to win a Rokform iPhone 13 Rugged Case, tempered glass screen protector, windshield mount, G-Rok Bluetooth speaker, and Sport Ring accessory.
